## For Project Submissions

- [ ] Repository has the topic `fossradar` (case-insensitive)
- [ ] Project has an India connection (founder/organization/community/contributor)
- [ ] License is OSI-approved (check data/licenses-osi.json)
- [ ] Tags are from the allowlist (check data/tags.toml)
- [ ] Filename matches slug (e.g., my-project.toml for slug = "my-project")
- [ ] All required fields are filled correctly
- [ ] Logo file added (if applicable) under /public/logos/

## Auto-Verification âœ“

Our CI will automatically check if you're affiliated with the project repository:
- Repository owner
- Organization member
- Collaborator with write access
- Contributor with commits

If affiliated, your project will be marked as **Verified** automatically!
